mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collections (user_id, title, description, scope, music_keyword) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{scope}, #{musicKeyword})
mapper.update: UPDATE collections SET collection_id=#{collectionId}, user_id=#{userId}, title=#{collection.title}, description=#{collection.description}, scope=#{collection.scope}, music_keyword=#{collection.musicKeyword}, image_path=#{collection.imagePath} WHERE collection_id=#{collectionId}
mapper.select: SELECT collection_id, user_id, title, description, scope, created_at, music_keyword, image_path FROM collections LIMIT 3
